actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to waive the 10-percent additional tax on early distributions from section 401(k) plans in the case of hardship of certain employees due to facility closures, employers in bankruptcy, or plan termination proceedings.

summary.text: 401(k) Penalty Relief Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to waive the penalty for premature distributions from a 401(k) retirement plan for employee hardship distributions due to the bankruptcy of an employer, the termination of a retirement plan, or the closure of a facility of the employer.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to waive the 10-percent additional tax on early distributions from section 401(k) plans in the case of hardship of certain employees due to facility closures, employers in bankruptcy, or plan termination proceedings.
